name: Aloo Chana
description: Made with boiled potatoes, chickpeas, onions, tomatoes, and a blend of spices like cumin, coriander, and chili powder, often garnished with cilantro and lemon.

name: Butternut Squash Curry
description: Made with butternut squash, onions, tomatoes, coconut milk, and a blend of spices like turmeric, cumin, and garam masala, creating a rich and flavorful curry.

name: Bitter Gourd Curry
description: Made with bitter gourd (karela), onions, tomatoes, and spices like turmeric, cumin, and coriander, cooked in a tangy and savory curry sauce.

name: Eggplant Potato Curry
description: Made with eggplant, potatoes, onions, tomatoes, and a variety of spices like cumin, coriander, and garam masala, creating a hearty and flavorful curry.

name: Drumstick Curry
description: Made with drumsticks (moringa pods), tomatoes, onions, and spices like turmeric, cumin, and coriander, simmered in a rich and flavorful curry sauce.
